column2: The year is 1358 Dale Reckoning, the Year of Shadows, and the Tablets of Fate have been stolen from the great deity Ao the Overlord, bringing about the Time of Troubles.
The year is 1368 Dale Reckoning, the Year of the Banner, during the Era of Upheaval, and the Time of Troubles is coming to an end.

Azoun of noble house Obarskyr is King of Cormyr, on the shores of the Dragonreach. He is backed by a long lineage of famous Obarskyrs and the High Wizard Vangerdahast. However, not all the noble houses of Cormyr seek to uphold the throne. Can Azoun deal with the enemies hidden in plain sight, and keep the Kingdom of Cormyr in one piece?

Since the last High King of the Moonshae Isles stepped down in 944 DR, the windswept islands have been ruled by a number of petty kings. Tristan, of the long-standing Kendrick dynasty, is one of them, ruling over the Kingdom of Corwell, the southern reaches of the island of Gwynneth. This area of the Moonshaes has long been the realm of the Ffolk, a proud people, but the Northmen occupy these isles as well, and bitter conflict has plagued the Moonshaes’ past. Can King Tristan hold what power he has, or will it fall into the wrong hands?
